title: How the Other Half Lives by Jacob Riis - subject

content.prompt: Jacob Riis’s How the Other Half Lives is a study of

choices.label: Jim Crow segregation and its effect on African Americans
the plight of Great Plains farmers in the 1890’s
corruption in city political machines in the 1890’s
the rise of industrial capitalists in the late nineteenth century.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
